name: Construction Build & Play! Toy Vehicle Game For Kids and Toddlers
name_original: Construction Build & Play! Toy Vehicle Game For Kids and Toddlers
description:
Play, build, race with fun toy Construction Vehicles!

I loved playing with construction toys, so I worked with my children to make a simple, easy to play with toy construction app. The bulldozers, cranes, and trucks are all full 3D, with suspension, tires or tread, headlights, and a honking horn. Play through mud and dirt in construction mini games. Use taps to drive and operate your bulldozer, crane, or dump truck to move rocks, raise cargo, and dump deliveries! Select your favorite construction vehicle from several types and colors! Too dirty? Run through the car wash!

Plus we added safety tips after each level for your kids to learn as they play.

My four year-old loves it, and we hope your little kids love it, too!

• High resolution, interactive, 3D construction vehicles with horns and lights
• Easy, clear button controls for little fingers
• Safety tips to help kids learn
• Lots of fun levels, three different vehicles, and fun color skins!
